name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go2Mail: Save Links & Articles to Email

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save ad-free articles and links you find on the web directly to your Gmail inbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Go2Mail saves links & articles directly to your email with just one click.

No more switching apps or endless tabs! Go2Mail simplifies saving content for later use. 

Read articles in a ad-free format, with preserved format directly from your email inbox. Access bookmarks offline or organize them with powerful email search & filter options.

Here's how it works:
1. Find an interesting article or webpage you would like to bookmark? Click the Go2Mail extension icon in Chrome browser
2. Instantly saved to your email without ads and in original format! Read it later on any device, without Go2Mail


Why to use Go2Mail?
- One-Click Saving üñ±Ô∏è: Save articles & links directly to your email with a single click via extension button
- Read Anywhere, Anytime üåè: Access saved articles even offline, on any device using your email app
- Powerful Email Integration üìÆ: Use powerful built-in email search & filter options to find what you need in a flash
- No Downloads, No Hassle üßòüèª: Go2Mail works seamlessly with almost any email app, eliminating the need for extra apps or syncing issues

Bonus Features:
- Automatic PDF Snapshots: Keep a clean copy of saved articles in a PDF format
- Mobile & Kindle Friendly: Save articles on the go or send them directly to your Kindle device

**Privacy Promise:** Your data and email content are never stored by Go2Mail. We prioritize your privacy.
